channel.title: How can i add a already made shop to my server and find coordinates?
channel.description: please help me i got 2 servers and i want to pass a shop from 1 server to the other one ... how could i do this please help me thank you. also on my server it doesent give exact coordinates on a notepad what do i do?

item.title: How can i add a already made shop to my server and find coordinates?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“joelx617, post:5, topic:394306”]i looked in my notepad that says “shops” and “spawn-config” those are mostly only files i got about shops what should i do? i really want to teleport to my other shops but dont know coordinates? please someone help andi wanna add a shop but cant because i cant set coordinates?[/quote]you can do ::mypos to see where you are then change the coordinates in spawn .cfg or you can use ::tele to teleport to the shop

Read full topic
item.source: How can i add a already made shop to my server and find coordinates?

i looked in my notepad that says “shops” and “spawn-config” those are mostly only files i got about shops what should i do? i really want to teleport to my other shops but dont know coordinates? please someone help andi wanna add a shop but cant because i cant set coordinates?

item.title: How can i add a already made shop to my server and find coordinates?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“joelx617, post:3, topic:394306”]lol alright then how could i make an extra shop with items from another server? because i want that exact shop… and also how come i got some shops but i cant teleport to them because god knows where they are? what should i do?[/quote]you can find any shop by looking at your spawn.cfg

and you can make any shop via shopassistant.java

Read full topic
